title: Trump Says Venezuela Is Open for Business
description: President Donald Trump says China and Russia can buy all the oil they want from the US or Venezuela. He says there was no need for a second attack on the country after capturing former President Nicolás Maduro. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: President Donald Trump says China and Russia can buy all the oil they want from the US or Venezuela. He says there was no need for a second attack on the country after capturing former President Nicolás Maduro. (Source: Bloomberg)
